tool_description: This is a GSMArena device specifications database
name: GSMArenaParser
title: GSMArenaParser

api_list.name: Get devices by brand
Get specs of device
api_list.description: Returns specifications of specified device by manufacturer and model

api_list.name: Get all devices
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all available devices in db including their specifications
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gsmarenaparser.p.rapidapi.com/api/values/getalldevicespecs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gsmarenaparser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://gsmarenaparser.p.rapidapi.com/api/values/getalldevicespecs"
